knimeNode.name: SBML Writer
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node writes each tertiary or primary models from the input to a seperate SBML file.

fullDescription.intro: This node writes each tertiary or primary models from the input to a seperate SBML file.
fullDescription.option: Path where SBML files are written to.
Specifies the name of the models in SBML and the filename. Models are named $(Model Name)_1, $(Model Name)_2, ...
If a parameter should be handled as a variable (e.g. LOG10N0), name it here.

ports.inPort: All Primary or Tertiary Models that should be written to SBML
